name: @azure/turborepo-remote-cache
author: Microsoft Corporation
description: TurboRepo remote cache using Azure Blob Storage

scripts.integration-test: npm run integration-test:node && npm run integration-test:browser
scripts.lint: eslint package.json api-extractor.json README.md src test
scripts.lint:fix: eslint package.json api-extractor.json README.md src test --fix --fix-type [problem,suggestion]
scripts.test: npm run clean && dev-tool run build-package && npm run unit-test:node && dev-tool run build-test && npm run unit-test:browser && npm run integration-test
scripts.test:browser: npm run clean && npm run unit-test:browser && npm run integration-test:browser
scripts.test:node: npm run clean && dev-tool run build-package && npm run unit-test:node && npm run integration-test:node
scripts.unit-test: npm run unit-test:node && npm run unit-test:browser
